title: Lily Bush’s Substitute Marriage
Sam Plays the Game
summary:
Kosuke found himself in a whole different world. Standing there with the wilderness to the east and a forest to his left, he decided to make good use of the occurrence, and tests his knowledge, to where he finds this amazing crafting ability, just like the games from his original world! ――This is a light for life in a different world. When I thought, I was suddenly attacked by a beautiful dark elf...?!
___
- [Official LN (Eng)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/survival-in-another-world-with-my-mistress-light-novel/)

title: I’m The Tyrant Family’s Beloved Baby
Food Chain
summary:
I, Go Eun-woo, have lived while hiding my status among humans. I used my abilities to reduce the pain of scarlet fever, the fate of the Tiger tribe, which I have suffered from since I was 18, but was discovered by the Tiger's natural enemy, Imae.
“Don’t be so foolish. If you run away, you’ll die by my hands in a month or so.”
Moreover, this cold and frighteningly handsome Lee Mae,
I can’t believe I have the same seal as Lee Do-hoon. I bought time by lying, but it's only a matter of time before I get caught. I have to escape from his grasp somehow... !
“Please stay in my room with me for the time being.”
Can I go back to my normal daily life?!

title: My Little Brother Is The Academy’s Hotshot
Helmut: The Forsaken Child
summary:
Helmut was a child who had been abandoned in the Demonic Beast Forest at birth.
Raised by Demonic Beasts, the first human that he met was the Sword Saint Darien.
Little did Helmut know that the chance encounter would soon shake the foundation of his fate…

“Grow stronger If you want to get out of here.”

The boy who’d lived like a beast was thrown into the human world!
He possessed overwhelming swordsmanship, outstanding looks and sharp intelligence, but there was one thing he lacked: humanity.

I am no longer a prey. I am now a predator!

title: Didn’t We Agree To Have Pure Love?
summary:
When the sadistic heroine travels through time and space to the body of the puppet princess of a fallen nation in a 18+ novel... Can she keep herself unscathed in a den teeming with hungry wolves?

"Wait... Didn't they say this is a pure love story? Why are there so many perverted male protagonists?!"

title: Tears on a Withered Flower
summary: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.

title: Being a Maid is Better than Being a Princess
summary:
Siana was a princess of a small kingdom. Until the imperial army attacked…

Just before her neck was about to be cut by the cruel prince, Siana screamed, “Please spare me!”

Towards the prince with blood staining his beautiful face, Siana pleaded with a desperate voice.

“I have many skills learned in the palace. Wouldn’t I be useful as a maid?”

And so, Siana became a probationary maid of the palace. But surprisingly, the job suited her temperament?! When she swept the floors, the corridors became clean, when she kneaded dough, sweet cookies were baked, when she did laundry, the bedding became white and fragrant! She only did her best as a maid, but gradually, the royal family began to warm up to Siana.

“The tea you brewed is always the best.”

“The dress you made? Truly beautiful.”

“I want you to educate the prince.”

But she never thought of capturing this man’s heart…

“I feel the same.”

“…”

“I can’t live without you, Siana,” hearing the tender voice of the prince, Siana tightly closed her eyes.

Look, Your Highness. I just want to live as an ordinary maid!

title: Loved by The Dead
summary:
Collection of oneshots from author Tatsuki Fujimoto.

Volume 1: 17-21

- Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita, 庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)**
A strange world where aliens have taken over the human world, and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.

- Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa, 佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)**
To Sasaki, his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true, no matter how low the odds. Yet one day, trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation, Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.

- Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku, 恋は盲目)**
A one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?

- Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)**
A notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.

Volume 2: 22-26

- Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody, 人魚ラプソディ)**
In a world where sirens are common, the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea, when a strange siren approaches him…

- Chapter 2. **"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou, 目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)**
A boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!

- Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta, 予言のナユタ)**
A tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world, and her brother.

- Chapter 4. **Little Sister's Elder Sister (Imouto no Ane, 妹の姉)**
A story about sisters aspiring to be artists.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Standard of Reincarnation
summary:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.

title: I Became the Male Lead’s Adopted Daughter
summary:
"I'm going to adopt a child."

Duke Phileo Boleoti's impulsive decision shocked everyone in the mansion. Not only did he make her his daughter, but he also gave her the name of a 'beast' that only direct members of the bloodline could receive.

"Even as you breathe right now, I'm earning money."
"It's confidence, not arrogance."
"My face really does have its advantages."
The most arrogant father in the whole world, and-

"I love muscles the most. Let's get muscular."
"Show me your thigh muscles! Your butt would be even better!"
"You're nothing but a flower if you have a calm personality…" his corrupted(?) daughter. 

And… "I will give his excellency the information he wants most."

"Information I want most, you say…"

"You won’t regret it."

…A stepmother(?) with a strange secret as well.

title: Kneel, Your Grace!
summary:
Everyone dreams of knocking out their insufferable boss, but what if that boss is a war hero, a duke, and constantly breathing down your neck? For Chloe, enduring Curtis's relentless inspections was a daily struggle... Until a royal marriage decree offers her an unexpected way out.

---
Everyone has had the urge to punch their infuriating boss, but actually going through with it is hard. Especially when that boss is a war hero and a grand duke, no less. Chloe could only grit her teeth as she watched Curtis constantly conduct service inspections… but then, a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity presented itself. The king ordered Curtis to marry a noblewoman from another country, and he put forward his lieutenant, Chloe, as his lover. Now, the gun was in her hands… “First, get on your knees, Your Grace.”

title: I’m a Fake Saintess but the Gods are Obsessed
summary:
I reincarnated into the body of a fake saintess who will die when the real saintess appears five years later. If I were to gather the monthly allowance given to the saintess I can at the very least buy a building! But while I was carefully setting up a plan to run away after playing the role of the saintess... 

"Choose me, or else..." 

"I prepared a prison just for you. My goddess—" 

"..." 

The male leads reacted differently than I expected. 

[The bored divine beings have started to gain interest after watching you.] 

I, Ariel, unexpectedly gained the interest of the gods. On top of that, the final boss who is planning on destroying the world isn't killing me, but helping me...? I have no interest in gaining the interest of the gods or destroying the world! So please just let me become a landlord like I wanted—!

title: I’m Gonna Annihilate This Land
summary:
Kim Isaac, once the all-powerful Skeleton King, is now a baby in a onesie. Tricked by the gods and sealed away, he’s reincarnated into a family of saints at the heart of the Holy Empire. He can’t walk or talk, but he can plot. And with his loyal demon followers working from the shadows and a grudge deeper than the underworld itself, this baby isn’t here to be cute—he’s here for payback. The Holy Empire has no idea what's coming… and the gods are about to regret ever crossing the Skeleton King. 

---

**Original Webtoon:**     
- [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/65947762)
- [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4-%EB%82%98%EB%9D%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%97%86%EC%95%A8-%EC%98%88%EC%A0%95%EC%9D%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%9A%94/4388)

**Official Translations:**    
- [English](https://tapas.io/series/holy-hellas-ultimate-end/)
- [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/181153)

title: The S-Class Hunter Doesn’t Want to Be a Villainous Princess
summary:
S-class Hunter Kim Yiyoung can't wait to leave the novel she woke up in. She gets the chance after defeating the story's final boss, but instead of returning home, she's sent into another novel! Yiyoung becomes Lady Renee Markious, a petty villainess who's just been framed for murder. Fortunately, Yiyoung has a secret weapon nobody knows about… her skills from her past life! Can Yiyoung clear Renee's name and find her way back to her own world? Or will she be trapped in this tale for good?

---
"I'm done with romance, so send me home!"

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.

Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home! Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

"Can I go home...?"

title: Divorce Plan
summary:
I already possess the body of a woman who will marry the devil. In a role haunted by her husband until death.

"I will always be by your side!"

I've decided to be nice to this poor husband for a while. But before one day, when I had reached adulthood and planned to divorce. A little angel appeared in the night full of surprises. Oh, man. So I tried to run away before being discovered…

"Richard? Something's not right…"

"I have no intention of letting you run away, even if you die, you must stay in my arms. Elisha."

Trying to cry and beg with a pretty face is also not possible.

"Where are you going to take our child?"

Did he even chase after me with those cold eyes? …I guess I was wrong to run away like this. How to solve this situation?

---
After losing her parents at an early age, noble lady Elissa Lohengrin is brought into the powerful House Rubelin by the duke so that she can marry his grandson, Richard. However, having read this story in her past life, Elissa knows Richard is destined to murder her! To avoid this, Elissa makes a deal with Richard to divorce when they become adults. But as she plans for her future single life, Richard's feelings begin to grow, and a whirlwind of events begins that pulls Elissa closer to danger.

title: The Princess Of A Fallen Kingdom Kisses Him Morning And Night To Break The Curse
summary:
Cheryl, the princess of a fallen country, was cursed by Piany, the princess of the enemy country that destroyed her country, to "burn her body when exposed to sunlight," and she spent her days being tortured. However, when Liam, a handsome general, came to the castle to occupy it, Cheryl was protected. As an efficient way to break the curse, she decided to kiss Liam morning and night to inject his magical power into her...!?
This kiss was necessary to break the curse. But that was all it was supposed to be--

title: The Spy’s Life In The Demonic Cult
summary: Jang Yiseo, a spy from the Murim Alliance who infiltrated the Demonic Cult, was given his first and last mission. To make the notoriously unruly Seventh Young Master, Ma-oh, the Vice Cult Leader! Despite his extraordinary martial prowess, Yiseo’s potential was hindered by his frail constitution. Meanwhile, Ma-Oh, a prodigious yet unpredictable force, walked the fine line between genius and madness. As their fates intertwined, the two had to navigate treachery, power struggles, and the ever-present risk of exposure. Can Jang Yiseo make Ma-Oh rise to the rank of being second only to the Cult Leader, or will the shadows consume them first?

title: The Best Martial Arts Instructor In The World
summary: The Demonic Cult Leader, Seok Woncho, was a monster who even surpassed the Blood Cult Leader. Do you know who killed him? “Ha Mu-baek.” “But why are you bringing that up…?” “Because he’s coming to our Mengryong Academy as an instructor.” …Damn it. We’re screwed! Ha Mu-baek, the greatest martial artist who crushed both the Demonic Cult and the Blood Cult, is now assigned as an instructor at a martial arts training academy due to a political power struggle. Determined to live quietly while keeping his identity hidden, he soon finds himself solving the problems of cadets with heart-wrenching backstories, disciplining the trashy human scum at the academy, and inexplicably becoming busier by the day… Welcome! It’s your first time meeting a genius lunatic instructor, isn’t it?!

title: Mr Devourer, Please Act Like a Final Boss
summary:
The Primordial Core’s an unconquerable dungeon, the lair of the most powerful monster ever to exist, the Original Monster, the incarnation of evil — Swallow... who happens to be a lazy boss monster who just wants to sleep.

Taking care of this lazy bum is Renee, a homunculus maid whose obsession with Swallow knows no bounds. At this point, the only one keeping the dungeon running is Patrick, the last brain cell of the bunch — and he’s a skeleton!

Will Mr. Swallow get any rest amid all this chaos?

title: The Indomitable Wanderer
summary:
I am a wanderer martial artist. I don’t shy away from blood, but I’m ready to retire. Should I take one last job? or not?

For many long years, he has roamed as a wandering martial artist's, living as a hired blade to make ends meet.

But now, he finds himself utterly penniless, living in poverty with nothing to his name.

As a master of martial arts at the peak level, he makes a decision, to take on one final, high-stakes mission, earn a fortune, and put an end to his life as a wanderer.

The story follows his journey as he takes on this last assignment and the unexpected twists that unfold along the way.

title: Regressed Genius Creates Mythic Items
summary:
On the day of the Earth's destruction, Level 1 Alchemist Kim Si-moon forged the Philosopher's Stone, which can do anything if an equivalent exchange is established.

[What do you desire?]

Right now, all he want is to destroy the Earth, to give the man responsible for his brother's death a good kicking, and to live a life without magic! 

He thought he'd ended his life full of regrets... yet he woke up 11 years in the past.

This time, he'll undo his miserable life as a disenchanted person and all the suffering that will happen in the future! 

Follow Si-moon's journey to change the future with his partner, the Philosopher's Stone!

title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.

title: To the Noble and the Vile You
summary: Alban realized he had been reincarnated as the villainous noble in a certain novel. Just as he began training in swordsmanship and magic to avoid defeat by the protagonist, he learned that Leticia, a noblewoman surrounded by nasty rumors, was to become his wife! He was nervous about what kind of "evil woman" she might be... but, upon meeting her, he found an incredibly pure girl — angelic, and exactly his type! Alban, forgetting all about avoiding his doom due to her adorableness, resolved to take revenge on the mastermind who had set up his beloved wife! Using their villainous reputation to their advantage, they set out to lure the culprit, but... will they succeed?

title: I Never Abandoned the Tyrant
summary: Born and abandoned in the mountains, Hadar, picked up by an ancient dragon. With inherent powerful magical abilities, he is raised by the ancient dragon and, without realizing, becomes the "strongest being" capable of advanced magic at the age of 12. Hadar is sent to the most challenging magic academy by the ancient dragon to adapt to human society. However, he effortlessly dominates school life with his magical prowess!!

title: The Summer Swallowed by Darkness
summary:
After her grandmother’s passing, Na Suhyeon returns to her hometown, leaving behind her city life.

Drawn by an inexplicable force, she climbs Obong Mountain—a place her grandmother had strictly forbidden her from entering while alive.

Lost deep in the woods and facing a mysterious danger, Suhyeon is rescued by a man named Seo Munju, who appears unharmed even after being beheaded.

Munju claims that Suhyeon is the reincarnation of Gang Yuhwa, his former spiritual mother and a shaman, and that the strange occurrences began when she set foot on the mountain.

Though wary of Munju, Suhyeon witnesses the chaos caused by vengeful spirits empowered by stolen sacred relics once buried in Gang Yuhwa’s grave. Moved by a sense of responsibility, she decides to help recover the five relics.

Munju suspects that the evil spirit who once drove Gang Yuhwa to her death is now reacting to Suhyeon’s aura and desecrated her grave.

Now, Suhyeon and Munju set out to confront tormented spirits and reclaim the relics.

Can they exorcise the evil spirit and end Munju’s eternal curse?

title: Beware of the Strongest Man Who is Crazy About Me
summary: For her sister's happiness and happy ending, Charlotte decides to bring home the knight who holds her sister's heart. However, that means getting to the Black Dragon Order, where the mysterious Archduke Ludovika lurks. With rumors of the archduke's penchant for men, Charlotte dons a wig and becomes Charcharl, a new squire of the order! Despite trying to lay low, she keeps drawing the archduke's eye and suspicions. Can Charcharl keep up the act till the end, or will her cover get blown?

title: Obsession Syndrome
summary:
“They came looking for me. The secret from back then has already been uncovered by them. If we want to save him, we must kill the other one.”  

A letter from the orphanage mother after years of silence pulls Green back into the nightmare of his childhood. Soon after, Green sees *them* again at her funeral—his childhood friends, Chen Zeyu and Tao Ye.  

The three move into Tao Ye’s small Western-style house and begin to test each other’s sincerity.  Who must be killed? Who is to be saved? And what role does Green play in all of this? Who is that boy—vague in memory, yet the one who once stirred Green’s heart?

title: In This Life, I’m Resigning From Being a Villain Queen
summary: "Congratulations, host, for completing the ultimate mission to kill the Bloody Queen, Reina. Guard leader Max's favorability has reached maximum, and your charm index has reached maximum..." Hearing this sudden electronic chime, I should be happy too. That is, if I'm not Reina. After death, Reina returns to five years ago, knowing that her loyal guard, gentle fiancé, and tsundere brother will all soon backstab her and fall under the host's spell. This time, Reina decides to just run away.

title: It Wasn’t Love at First Sight
summary:
Duke Adler, referred to as the greatest man of the Asgard Empire, is as handsome as a sculpture. However, he is also a serial killer, playing the role of the villain in a novel. On top of that, Princess Charlotte, who was politically married to him, was fated to be murdered on their first night together.

The predicament is that I am the princess fated to die at his hands on that night.

"It's a political marriage, and it's not as if we want to see each other anyway, so let's just meet on our wedding day."

It was evident that the villain was displeased with the idea of marrying me. Hence, I made a decision.

"It was love at first sight. So, please go out with me!"

With only six months left until the wedding, I resolved to carry out an undercover investigation by pretending to date him. People wouldn't believe my words, so I had no choice but to gather evidence myself.

Even though she had planned to reveal the fact that he was a serial killer by hovering around him...

***

"You said you fell in love with me at first sight, so what were you doing here with another man?"

A cold voice flowed into my ears.

"W-What do you mean? I was just dancing to ensure there were no disruptions at the banquet..."

The nape of my neck heated up from the hot breath brushing against the outer edges of my ear. The contrast between his warm touches and the cool tone of his voice intoxicated me even more.

"You called his name so affectionately, as he held you tightly in his arms."
"Gasp."

Unable to escape the strong scent that clouded my senses, I held my breath. My whole body tingled from the strange sensation spreading from my neck to the rest of my body. He tilted his head and said...

"If there's someone else's scent coming from you... I'll have an urge to kill."

title: After Becoming a Dumpling, the Villain Family All Wants to Kill Me!
For the Happy Ending of the Tragic Novel
summary: 'I' was possessed in [The Miracle of Dawn], a bad ending novel in which the deplorable male leads do whatever they can to possess the priestess 'Belle'. I think I was reincarnated as Rosiana, an obstacle that hinders the main character's happiness. "Maybe I'll be able to change the ending of this novel?"

title: I Caught the Male Lead on a Deserted Island
The Saintess Returns as a Villain
summary: Beatrice has lived as a saint for 10 years to prevent the disaster of the empire and win the love of her family. One day, her place as a saint was taken away by a girl named Lina Cumbell with her black hair... “I will kill you, your family, and all your followers.” She is framed as a warlock and executed. Beatrice's second life began like that. “Even if this life becomes a villainess… Lina, I will avenge you!!” The new life of Riche, a true saint who decided to become a villain, is redrawn.

title: Invasion of the Myriad Races: Starting by Taming a Legendary Beast
summary: All races have invaded Earth. Su Bai’s pet turtle evolved into the Black Tortoise , and his cat into the White Tiger . The Vermilion Bird and Azure Dragon , ancient sacred beasts, soon followed. However, these divine beasts have enormous appetites, which led Su Bai to become a notorious businessman that gives everyone headaches.“Brother, this is Black Tortoise blood, only selling for a mere ten billion. Hey, why are you cursing at me just because you’re not buying?”“The champion of the Hundred Schools competition wins ten billion? Help me up, I can still fight!”“The main city of all races has countless riches? As a human, I must protect my Dragon Country. I will lead the charge!

title: Calm Down, Lady Ophelia!
summary: The tsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsundere girl getting less and less tsun day by day.

title: The End of a Fake Marriage
summary: When Miyagi, the head of a well-established Japanese restaurant, is confessed to by Kasuga, a chef-in-training visiting from a sister restaurant, the next day and every day after invites continuous sexual advances! Even as he struggles to resist Kasuga's proposals, what will happen as Miyagi becomes moved by Kasuga's unwavering attempts?!

title: You Have to Repay Your Savior
summary:
Fristine, a noblewoman whose family has fallen into ruin and who lives in the countryside,
is appointed by the king to care for the exiled princess.
Although the princess is being kept alive as a hostage and used as a political tool,
Fristine takes good care of her and succeeds in saving her from a life-threatening situation.
Later, the king is replaced and the princess is released from exile, where Fristine is invited to the palace
. In recognition of her past achievements, she is granted an audience with the king.
However, the king she meets is none other than Gerard, with whom Fristine was once in love.
This unexpected reunion sets her destiny in motion.

title: It Was Just a Contract Marriage
summary:
The empress of a fallen nation was dragged to the enemy empire. Despite everything, the Treasure of Grandel was still gorgeous. However, in the end she was just a captive who was going to be hanged by the savages. Eliza wanted to avoid that outcome no matter what, even if she had to tell outrageous lies. There was only one option: the man known as Banella's guard dog, the enemy empire's commander, and a lowly and vicious warrior—Lezet Christian. Eliza had to convince this cold and obstinate man who stood before her.

In a trembling voice, she said, "I'll give you a child."

title: I’m Actually a Cultivation Bigshot
summary: Li Nianfan transmigrated to an immortal cultivation world as a mortal. Knowing that he could never become a cultivator, he decided to live an ordinary life. But unbeknownst to him, his dog became a mighty Yaoguai king by watching him draw and write; the tree he planted in the backyard became the tree of the world by listening to tunes he played; a passerby he met, who gained enlightenment from the chitchat with him, became a Taoist sage and started a new era...

title: The Sacrificial Princess Ran Away and Was Devotedly Adored
My Body Has Been Possessed By Someone
summary: Seven years ago, Kanna was thrown into the body of a Korean girl named Joohwa. She had everything in her new life—a loving family, a great boyfriend, a hard-won medical license, even her own clinic! But that all changes when she's suddenly swapped back one day. Just as she's been in Joohwa's body, Joohwa has been in hers... and she's left Kanna's life a mess! First things first, she's going to divorce her cold husband, Duke Silvian Valentino. After that? Revenge on everyone who's wronged her.

title: If I Don’t Die Soon, I Will Rule The Demon Realm
summary: Humanity’s strongest warrior was killed by demons amidst a battle and gained the power to reincarnate, but somehow did so as a demon. Only by dying he can go back to living as a human, so he committed suicide non-stop. But things turned out to be the opposite of what he expected…

title: Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
summary: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!

title: Extraordinary World! I, a vampire…
summary:
Another world: Lexia, the first princess of the Kingdom of Arcelia. When it comes to decisiveness and the ability to take action, no one can match her; in some ways, she is the "strongest" princess. As a result of being extremely bored with life in the royal castle, the words she uttered were...

"I've made up my mind! I'm going to set out on a journey to save people who are in trouble!"

So, forcibly bringing along Luna—a girl who is her bodyguard and has a background as a top-notch assassin—Lexia sets off on an adventure around the world.

title: The DUKE who fell into darkness dotes on The VILLAINESS
The Night After the Divorce
summary:
A year ago, Kaho married Shinya, who worked at an advertising agency. Their married life ended abruptly when she discovered his infidelity.

The void in her heart was unexpectedly filled by Iori, a younger college student. "I'm here for you, Kaho."

Though drawn to Iori, Kaho now faces pressure from Shinya to reconcile. Torn between two men, she must choose:

"Do I embrace this new love? Or repair what was broken?"

title: The oppressed magic tool maker elopes with a mod butler
summary:
I never expected the dull servant to actually be a prince...!

Erin, a young girl who devotes herself to developing magical tools to fulfill her late mother’s dream of "making people happy with magic tools."

However, as the child of a mistress, Erin is in a difficult position and endures relentless harassment from her stepmother.

Despite her struggles to achieve her dream, Erin's hopes are crushed by her stepmother's schemes, and she is pushed to the depths of despair.

In her darkest moment, the only ally she has, the servant Foolda, reaches out to her.

"Would you elope with me?"
